Title event_note @if (holidayForm.get('title')?.hasError('required')) { Please enter title }
Start date @if (holidayForm.get('sDate')?.hasError('required')) { Please select start date }
End date @if (holidayForm.get('eDate')?.hasError('required')) { Please select end date }
Holiday type Public Holiday Holiday by school @if (holidayForm.get('type')?.hasError('required')) { type is required }
